是否	whether (or not); if; is or isn't	我不知道是否明天会下雨。	I don't know whether it will rain tomorrow.	你确定是否需要我的帮助？	Are you sure if you need my help?	他在考虑是否要接受这个工作。	He is considering whether to take this job or not.
交际	communication; social intercourse	他很擅长交际。	He is very good at socializing.	在这个职位上，交际能力非常重要。	In this position, communication skills are very important.	她的交际圈很广。	Her social circle is very wide.
熟悉	to be familiar with; to know well	我对这个地方很熟悉。	I am very familiar with this place.	她熟悉这个行业的规则。	She knows the rules of this industry well.	他们需要时间来熟悉新的工作环境。	They need time to get familiar with the new work environment.

使劲儿	erhua variant of 使勁|使劲[shi3 jin4]	他使劲儿把箱子搬到了车上。	He exerted all his strength to move the box onto the car.	她使劲儿地拧紧了水龙头。	She tightened the faucet with all her strength.	你要使劲儿拉这个绳子。	You need to pull this rope hard.
一块儿	erhua variant of 一塊|一块[yi1 kuai4]	我们一块儿去吃饭吧。	Let's go eat together.	他们一块儿去看电影了。	They went to see a movie together.	我们一块儿学习，一块儿进步。	We study together and make progress together.
停	to stop; to halt; to park (a car)	司机停了车，我们下车了。	The driver stopped the car, and we got off.	请不要在这里停车。	Please do not park the car here.	他停下来休息了一会儿。	He stopped to rest for a while.

客气	polite; courteous; formal; modest	你不用这么客气。	You don't have to be so polite.	她的回答既客气又坚定。	Her response was both polite and firm.	他的态度非常客气。	His attitude is very polite.

致力	to work for; to devote one's efforts to	他致力于环保事业。	He devotes his efforts to environmental protection.	她一直致力于提高教育水平。	She has always been working for the improvement of education.	他致力于帮助贫困地区的孩子。	He is devoted to helping children in impoverished areas.
专长	specialty; special knowledge or ability	她的专长是钢琴演奏。	Her specialty is piano performance.	他在计算机方面有很强的专长。	He has a strong expertise in computer science.	这个团队的专长是市场营销。	The team's specialty is marketing.
宝石	precious stone; gem; CL:枚[mei2],顆|颗[ke1]	她收藏了很多宝石。	She collects a lot of gems.	这块宝石非常昂贵。	This gemstone is very expensive.	他送给她一颗红宝石。	He gave her a red gemstone.
不对	incorrect; wrong; amiss; abnormal; queer	你的答案是不对的。	Your answer is incorrect.	他的行为有点不对劲。	His behavior is a bit abnormal.	这件事情感觉不对。	Something feels wrong about this matter.
部分	part; share; section; piece; CL:個|个[ge4]	这是我的部分工作。	This is my part of the work.	他只吃了一部分晚饭。	He only ate a part of the dinner.	这个项目分成了几个部分。	The project is divided into several sections.
很	(adverb of degree); quite; very; awfully	她很高兴。	She is very happy.	这个问题很复杂。	This problem is quite complicated.	他很快就会到达。	He will arrive very soon.
便条	(informal) note; CL:張|张[zhang1],個|个[ge4]	他给我留了一张便条。	He left me a note.	她经常在便条上写一些提醒。	She often writes reminders on notes.	我把便条贴在了冰箱上。	I stuck the note on the fridge.
吃饭	to have a meal; to eat; to make a living	他在家吃饭。	He eats at home.	你吃饭了吗？	Have you eaten?	他靠卖画吃饭。	He makes a living by selling paintings.
电梯	elevator; escalator; CL:臺|台[tai2],部[bu4]	我们搭电梯上楼。	We take the elevator to go upstairs.	这栋大楼有很多部电梯。	This building has many elevators.	电梯坏了，我们只能走楼梯。	The elevator is broken, so we can only take the stairs.

可是	but; however; (used for emphasis) indeed	我很想去，可是我没有时间。	I really want to go, but I don't have time.	这个计划看起来很好，可是有一些问题。	This plan looks good, but there are some issues.	他很努力，可是成绩还是不理想。	He works very hard, but the results are still not ideal.

服	classifier for medicine: dose; Taiwan pr. [fu2]	这种药每次要服两粒。	You need to take two pills each time for this medicine.	他每天都按时服药。	He takes medicine on time every day.	这个药的服用方法很简单。	The method of taking this medicine is very simple.
出息	future prospects; profit; to mature; to grow up	他的出息不可限量。	His future prospects are limitless.	这个项目有很大的出息。	This project has great potential.	孩子已经长大，出息了。	The child has grown up and matured.

拼音	phonetic writing; pinyin (Chinese romanization)	我正在学习中文拼音。	I am learning Chinese phonetic writing.	在中国，人们通常用拼音输入法。	In China, people usually use pinyin input method.	学会拼音对学习中文很有帮助。	Learning pinyin is very helpful for learning Chinese.
瞧	to look at; to see; to see (a doctor); to visit	瞧，那是一只可爱的小猫。	Look, that's a cute little cat.	你瞧，他又迟到了。	Look, he's late again.	瞧，你的努力终于得到了回报。	Look, your efforts have finally paid off.

边疆	border area; borderland; frontier; frontier region	这个村庄位于边疆地区。	This village is located in the border area.	边疆地区的风景非常壮丽。	The scenery in the frontier region is very magnificent.	他们在边疆地区建立了一个农场。	They established a farm in the borderland.
乘车	to ride (in a car or carriage); to drive; to motor	我通常乘车上班。	I usually take a car to work.	她不喜欢乘车，更喜欢骑自行车。	She doesn't like riding in a car and prefers to ride a bicycle.	他学会了乘车，现在可以自己开车了。	He learned to ride in a car and can drive by himself now.
超出	to exceed; to overstep; to go too far; to encroach	他的表现超出了我们的预期。	His performance exceeded our expectations.	这个项目的成本超出了预算。	The cost of this project exceeded the budget.	超出规定范围的行为将受到处罚。	Behavior that exceeds the prescribed range will be punished.
等到	to wait until; by the time when (sth is ready etc)	等到你准备好了，我们就出发。	We will leave when you are ready.	等到下雨停了，我们再出去玩。	We'll go out to play when the rain stops.	等到他回来，我们再商量这件事。	We'll discuss this matter when he comes back.
表态	to declare one's position; to say where one stands	他在会议上表态支持这项提案。	He declared his support for the proposal at the meeting.	公司高层还没有表态是否同意这个计划。	The company's top management has not yet declared whether they agree with this plan.	政府需要表态，以安抚民众的情绪。	The government needs to declare its position to appease the public's emotions.
公交车	public transport vehicle; town bus; CL:輛|辆[liang4]	我每天都乘公交车上班。	I take the bus to work every day.	这个城市的公交车很方便。	The town buses in this city are very convenient.	公交车上的乘客很多，所以要注意安全。	There are many passengers on the bus, so safety should be paid attention to.
及时	timely; at the right time; promptly; without delay	请你及时完成这份工作。	Please complete this work in a timely manner.	他的帮助来得及时，让我们度过了难关。	His help came in time and helped us get through the difficult times.	及时的警告可以避免很多危险。	Timely warnings can prevent many dangers.
段落	phase; time interval; paragraph; (written) passage	这篇文章的每个段落都很有逻辑。	Every paragraph of this article is very logical.	我们在生活中会经历不同的段落。	We will experience different phases in life.	这个段落的内容很有深度。	The content of this passage is very profound.
风度	elegance (for men); elegant demeanor; grace; poise	他的风度给人留下了深刻的印象。	His elegance left a deep impression on people.	她的风度令人钦佩。	Her grace is admirable.	他的风度和谈吐都很有魅力。	His poise and manner of speaking are very charming.

恐怕	fear; to dread; I'm afraid that...; perhaps; maybe	我恐怕会迟到了。	I'm afraid I might be late.	恐怕这个问题不太容易解决。	I'm afraid this problem is not easy to solve.	恐怕他已经离开了。	I'm afraid he has already left.

出卖	to offer for sale; to sell; to sell out; to betray	他出卖了自己的朋友。	He betrayed his friend.	她出卖了公司的机密。	She sold the company's secrets.	他们出卖了自己的灵魂。	They sold their souls.
敢于	to have the courage to do sth; to dare to; bold in	他敢于挑战权威。	He dares to challenge authority.	她敢于追求自己的梦想。	She dares to pursue her dreams.	他敢于承担责任。	He dares to take responsibility.
等等	et cetera; and so on ...; wait a minute!; hold on!	我需要买一些水果，蔬菜等等。	I need to buy some fruits, vegetables, and so on.	他喜欢看电影，听音乐等等。	He likes to watch movies, listen to music, and so on.	我需要准备一些文件，笔，纸等等。	I need to prepare some documents, pens, paper, and so on.
目的	purpose; aim; goal; target; objective; CL:個|个[ge4]	我们的目的是实现和平。	Our goal is to achieve peace.	她来这里的目的是找到工作。	Her purpose in coming here is to find a job.	他们的目的是保护环境。	Their objective is to protect the environment.
书包	schoolbag; satchel; bookbag; CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]	我的书包里有很多书。	There are many books in my schoolbag.	她把钱包放在了书包里。	She put the wallet in the bookbag.	他的书包很重，里面装满了书。	His schoolbag is heavy, filled with books.
仅仅	barely; only; merely; only (this and nothing more)	这个项目仅仅是一个开始。	This project is just a beginning.	她仅仅是一个普通的学生。	She is just an ordinary student.	他仅仅是一个新手。	He is only a beginner.

中秋节	the Mid-Autumn Festival on 15th of 8th lunar month	中秋节是中国的传统节日之一。	The Mid-Autumn Festival is one of the traditional Chinese festivals.	我们家人会在中秋节吃月饼。	Our family eats mooncakes during the Mid-Autumn Festival.	中秋节是团圆的日子。	The Mid-Autumn Festival is a day for family reunion.

嚇尿	v. Spooked+pee. To be spooked and wet one’s pants.	他被突然的声音吓尿了。	He got spooked by the sudden sound and wet his pants.	小狗被雷声吓尿了。	The puppy got scared by the thunder and wet its pants.	她看到蜘蛛吓尿了。	She got scared and wet her pants when she saw the spider.

受灾	disaster-stricken; to be hit by a natural calamity	这个地区受灾严重。	This area is seriously disaster-stricken.	他们家庭受灾后，得到了很多人的帮助。	After their family was hit by a natural calamity, they received a lot of help.	这个村庄受灾后，生活变得很困难。	After this village was hit by a natural calamity, life became very difficult.
这么	so much; this much; how much?; this way; like this	你怎么可以对我这么说？	How can you say this to me?	这么晚了，你还不回家吗？	It's so late, aren't you going home yet?	这么好的机会，你怎么能错过？	How can you miss such a good opportunity?

不舒服	unwell; feeling ill; to feel uncomfortable; uneasy	她今天早上感到不舒服。	She felt unwell this morning.	他的脸色看起来很不舒服。	His complexion looks very uncomfortable.	这个床很硬，我睡得很不舒服。	This bed is very hard, I sleep very uncomfortably.
何况	let alone; to say nothing of; besides; what's more	他连基本的礼貌都不懂，何况做好事呢？	He doesn't even understand basic manners, let alone doing good deeds.	她连英语都不会说，何况其他语言呢？	She can't even speak English, let alone other languages.	他连自己的事情都处理不好，何况帮助别人呢？	He can't even handle his own affairs, let alone helping others.
及早	at the earliest possible time; as soon as possible	如果你发现问题，就应该及早解决。	If you find a problem, you should solve it as soon as possible.	及早预防疾病比治疗更重要。	Preventing diseases at the earliest possible time is more important than treating them.	及早完成工作，可以避免很多麻烦。	Finishing the work as soon as possible can avoid a lot of trouble.
早已	for a long time; long since; (dialect) in the past	他早已忘记了那件事。	He has long since forgotten about that matter.	这个问题早已解决了。	This problem has long been resolved.	他早已离开了这个城市。	He has long since left this city.
心愿	cherished desire; dream; craving; wish; aspiration	实现梦想是每个人的心愿。	Realizing dreams is everyone's cherished desire.	她的心愿是环游世界。	Her dream is to travel around the world.	他的心愿是成为一名科学家。	His wish is to become a scientist.

因而	therefore; as a result; thus; and as a result, ...	他一直很努力工作，因而得到了晋升。	He has been working hard, and as a result, he got promoted.	她一直保持健康的生活习惯，因而身体很好。	She has been maintaining healthy habits, thus her health is good.	我很喜欢这个城市的氛围，因而决定留在这里。	I really like the atmosphere of this city, therefore I decided to stay here.

精打细算	meticulous planning and careful accounting (idiom)	他的生意一直都很成功，因为他做事精打细算。	His business has always been successful because he plans meticulously.	这个项目需要精打细算，才能确保顺利完成。	This project requires meticulous planning to ensure smooth completion.	她的家庭开支一直都很精打细算。	Her family expenses have always been carefully accounted for.

之中	inside; among; in the midst of (doing sth); during	他在人群之中找到了她。	He found her among the crowd.	这个问题之中包含了很多复杂的因素。	This problem contains many complex factors within it.	我们在比赛之中取得了胜利。	We achieved victory during the competition.
自言自语	to talk to oneself; to think aloud; to soliloquize	他经常自言自语，好像在和自己对话。	He often talks to himself as if having a conversation with himself.	她在做饭的时候喜欢自言自语。	She likes to talk to herself while cooking.	他在思考问题的时候会自言自语。	He soliloquizes when thinking about problems.
力求	to make every effort to; striving to do one's best	他力求完成老板交代的任务。	He strives to complete the tasks assigned by the boss.	她力求在工作中取得更大的进步。	She makes every effort to make greater progress in her work.	我们力求提供客户最满意的服务。	We strive to provide the most satisfactory service to our customers.
冒充	to feign; to pretend to be; to pass oneself off as	他冒充警察，企图骗取钱财。	He pretended to be a police officer in an attempt to swindle money.	她冒充了我的朋友，想要获取我的个人信息。	She pretended to be my friend in order to obtain my personal information.	他冒充专家，给大家讲解健康知识。	He pretended to be an expert and explained health knowledge to everyone.

南辕北辙	to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)	他的做法完全是南辕北辙，导致了失败。	His approach was completely counterproductive, leading to failure.	这样的决定是南辕北辙的，对公司没有任何好处。	This decision is counterproductive and has no benefit to the company.	他的行为总是南辕北辙，让人很难理解。	His behavior is always self-defeating, making it hard for people to understand.

滔滔不绝	(idiom) to produce a torrent of words; to talk on and on	她一见到我就滔滔不绝地说个不停。	She talked on and on as soon as she saw me.	他在演讲中滔滔不绝地阐述了自己的观点。	He elaborated on his views in the speech.	他对着镜头滔滔不绝地讲述了自己的经历。	He talked endlessly in front of the camera about his experiences.
调剂	to adjust; to balance; to make up a medical prescription	这种药可以调剂身体的平衡。	This medicine can balance the body.	医生给他调剂了一副新的处方。	The doctor made up a new prescription for him.	她需要调剂一下工作和生活的关系。	She needs to adjust the relationship between work and life.
通缉	to order the arrest of sb as criminal; to list as wanted	警方通缉了这名嫌疑犯。	The police ordered the arrest of the suspect.	他因犯罪被通缉。	He was wanted for the crime.	这个罪犯已经被通缉很久了。	This criminal has been wanted for a long time.
斟酌	to consider; to deliberate; to fill up a cup to the brim	在做决定之前，我们需要斟酌一下。	We need to consider before making a decision.	他斟酌了一下自己的话。	He deliberated on his words.	她斟酌着把杯子倒满了水。	She filled up the cup to the brim with water.
办法	means; method; way (of doing sth); CL:條|条[tiao2],個|个[ge4]	我们必须想办法解决这个问题。	We must find a way to solve this problem.	他总是有办法应对困难。	He always has a way to deal with difficulties.	没有办法，我们只能等待。	There's no way, we can only wait.
帮忙	to help; to lend a hand; to do a favor; to do a good turn	你能帮忙搬一下这个箱子吗？	Can you help move this box?	谢谢你帮忙。	Thank you for helping.	他总是乐意帮忙别人。	He is always willing to help others.
玻璃	glass; CL:張|张[zhang1],塊|块[kuai4]; (slang) male homosexual	这个杯子是玻璃做的。	This cup is made of glass.	他不小心打破了玻璃。	He accidentally broke the glass.	玻璃的特性使得它成为了常见的建筑材料。	The characteristics of glass make it a common building material.
斑	spot; colored patch; stripe; spotted; striped; variegated	他的脸上有一块斑。	There is a spot on his face.	这件衣服有很多斑。	This piece of clothing has many spots.	这只猎豹身上有很多斑。	This cheetah has many spots on its body.
逛街	to take a walk; to window-shop; to stroll down the street	周末的时候，我喜欢和朋友一起逛街。	On weekends, I like to go shopping with friends.	她喜欢一个人逛街。	She likes to go shopping alone.	逛街是一种放松的方式。	Shopping is a relaxing way.

不时	from time to time; now and then; occasionally; frequently	他不时会给我发短信。	He would text me from time to time.	这个地方不时会下雨。	It occasionally rains in this area.	他不时地看着窗外。	He frequently looks out the window.
现在	now; at present; at the moment; modern; current; nowadays	我现在很忙。	I am very busy now.	现在是我们采取行动的时候了。	Now is the time for us to take action.	现在的年轻人对手机非常依赖。	Modern young people are very dependent on their phones.
附近	nearby; neighboring; (in the) vicinity (of); neighborhood	我家附近有一个很大的公园。	There is a very big park near my house.	这家餐厅附近有很多停车位。	There are many parking spaces near this restaurant.	这附近有很多好吃的餐馆。	There are many good restaurants in this neighborhood.
定檔	v. [Of a movie or TV show] is set to be released or aired	这部电影定档在下个月。	This movie is set to be released next month.	这部电视剧已经定档在明年的春季。	This TV show has been scheduled to air in the spring of next year.	这个综艺节目定档在每周五晚上九点。	This variety show is scheduled to air every Friday night at nine.
事情	affair; matter; thing; business; CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1]	这件事情很重要。	This matter is very important.	他总是很关心我的事情。	He always cares about my affairs.	这件事情已经解决了。	This matter has been resolved.
小姐	young lady; miss; (slang) prostitute; CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4]	这位小姐，请问你知道这附近有没有咖啡厅吗？	Miss, do you know if there is a coffee shop nearby?	她是一个有教养的小姐。	She is a well-bred young lady.	在中国，小姐也可以指年轻的未婚女性。	In China, "xiaojie" can also refer to young unmarried women.

偶然	incidentally; occasional; occasionally; by chance; randomly	我偶然在街上碰到了老朋友。	I ran into an old friend by chance on the street.	这是一个偶然的机会，我们要好好把握。	This is an occasional opportunity, we should make the most of it.	他偶然提到了这个计划，让我很惊讶。	He mentioned this plan incidentally, which surprised me.
配套	to form a complete set; compatible; matching; complementary	这些家具都是配套的，很搭配。	These furniture pieces are all matching and complement each other.	这个项目需要配套的设施和服务。	This project requires matching facilities and services.	这些产品都是配套销售的。	These products are sold as a complete set.
录像	to videotape; to videorecord; video recording; CL:盤|盘[pan2]	我把演唱会录像了下来。	I videotaped the concert.	这个录像记录了整个事件的过程。	This video recording documents the entire event.	他喜欢录像自己的日常生活。	He likes to video record his daily life.
评论	to comment on; to discuss; comment; commentary; CL:篇[pian1]	他经常在社交媒体上评论时事。	He often comments on current affairs on social media.	这篇评论对这本书的评价很高。	This commentary gives a high evaluation of this book.	我不想对他的决定进行评论。	I don't want to discuss his decision.
其余	the rest; the others; remaining; remainder; apart from them	这些是我的，其余的都是你的。	These are mine, the rest are all yours.	他们已经离开了，其余的人都留下来了。	They have already left, the remaining people all stayed.	这些是我们的任务，其余的由他们来完成。	These are our tasks, the rest will be completed by them.
认得	to recognize; to remember sth (or sb) on seeing it; to know	我认得这个地方，我来过这里。	I recognize this place, I have been here before.	她一眼就认得出了他。	She recognized him at a glance.	我认得这个字，但是不知道怎么写。	I recognize this character, but I don't know how to write it.
扭	to turn; to twist; to wring; to sprain; to swing one's hips	他扭动着身体跳舞。	He twists his body while dancing.	她不小心把脚扭伤了。	She accidentally sprained her foot.	他扭动着手腕，把绳子解开了。	He twisted his wrist to untie the rope.
铺	plank bed; place to sleep; shop; store; (old) relay station	他在铺上躺下休息了一会儿。	He lay down on the plank bed to rest for a while.	这家铺里的东西都很便宜。	The things in this store are all very cheap.	这个铺是我们的家族生意。	This shop is our family business.

棉	generic term for cotton or kapok; cotton; padded or quilted with cotton	这件衣服是棉的。	This piece of clothing is made of cotton.	这个枕头里面装的是棉。	This pillow is padded with cotton.	她喜欢穿棉质的衣服。	She likes to wear cotton clothes.

嗨p	adj. Hi+P. This Internet slang term is a phonetic deviation of “happy.”	今天的心情真是嗨p。	Today's mood is really "hi-p".	她听到好消息后变得嗨p起来。	She became "hi-p" after hearing the good news.	他的表演让观众感到嗨p。	His performance made the audience feel "hi-p".
随意	as one wishes; according to one's wishes; at will; voluntary; conscious	这里可以随意拍照。	You can take pictures here as you wish.	他随意挑选了一本书。	He casually picked a book.	请随意享用饮料。	Please help yourself to the drinks.

打击	to hit; to strike; to attack; to crack down on sth; blow; (psychological) shock; percussion (music)	这次打击对他的影响很大。	This blow had a big impact on him.	政府打击了犯罪活动。	The government cracked down on criminal activities.	他的话给了我一记重击。	His words gave me a heavy blow.
教训	to provide guidance; to lecture sb; to upbraid; a talking-to; a bitter lesson; CL:番[fan1],頓|顿[dun4]	这次失败是个很好的教训。	This failure is a good lesson.	他受到了老板的教训。	He received a lecture from the boss.	这是一个痛苦的教训。	This is a painful lesson.
穷	poor; destitute; to use up; to exhaust; thoroughly; extremely; (coll.) persistently and pointlessly	他们家很穷。	Their family is very poor.	这个问题让我感到很穷。	This problem makes me feel exhausted.	他穷尽一生追求真理。	He spent his whole life pursuing the truth.
键	key (on a piano or computer keyboard); button (on a mouse or other device); chemical bond; linchpin	这个键坏了。	This key is broken.	她按下了电脑键。	She pressed the computer key.	这个问题的关键在于解决这个难题。	The key to this problem is solving this puzzle.
金拱門	n. The golden arched door. This Internet slang term is the new official Chinese name of McDonald’s.	我们去金拱门吃汉堡包吧。	Let's go to the Golden Arches for hamburgers.	他们家的汉堡包很好吃。	The hamburgers at their place are delicious.	金拱门在中国很受欢迎。	McDonald's is very popular in China.
旁	one side; other; different; lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)	他坐在我旁边。	He is sitting next to me.	这个字旁是什么？	What is the side component of this character?	他们家住在我们旁边。	They live next to us.
拼	to piece together; to join together; to stake all; adventurous; at the risk of one's life; to spell	他们一起拼了一幅拼图。	They pieced together a puzzle together.	她为了梦想拼尽了全力。	She staked all for her dream.	我们一起拼写这个单词。	We spell this word together.

To binge-watch TV dramas or to keep up with the latest episodes of a new TV series.	我喜欢追劇，可以一口气看完一整季。	I like to binge-watch TV dramas and can finish a whole season in one go.	她每天晚上都追劇，几乎没有错过任何一集。	She keeps up with the latest episodes of TV series every night and hardly misses any.	追劇已经成为很多人的日常娱乐方式。	Binge-watching TV dramas has become a daily entertainment for many people.

飯	n. Fan.. The pinyin pronunciation of the Chinese character “rice” looks like the English word “fan”	我每天都吃两顿米饭。	I eat two meals of rice every day.	他不太喜欢吃米饭，更喜欢面条。	He doesn't like to eat rice very much and prefers noodles.	她做的炒饭非常好吃。	The fried rice she makes is very delicious.
脱离	to separate oneself from; to break away from; diastasis (medicine); abscission; abjunction (botany)	他试图脱离过去的生活，开始新的生活。	He tried to break away from his past life and start a new one.	这种植物在生长过程中会发生脱离现象。	This plant will undergo abscission during its growth process.	脱离家庭的孩子们需要更多的关爱和支持。	Children who are separated from their families need more love and support.

To drool over the online photos or videos of sexy people or scrumptious food.	她看到那个帅哥的照片，简直舔屏。	She saw the photo of that handsome guy and literally licked the screen.	这道美食图片看起来太诱人了，让人忍不住想舔屏。	The picture of this delicious food looks so tempting that one can't help but drool over it.	她每次看到自己喜欢的明星照片都会舔屏。	Every time she sees a photo of her favorite celebrity, she licks the screen.

內個	interj. An alternative of 那個 [nà ge] “that one. ” A common filler in Mandarin everyday conversations.	內個，你知道今天有什麼活動嗎？	That one, do you know what activities are happening today?	我內個，不太清楚。	I'm not quite sure about that one.	內個，你有沒有看到我的鑰匙？	That one, have you seen my keys?

甩鍋	v. Dump+wok. 1) To refuse to be wronged. 2) To shirk responsibility while one is actually responsible.	他总是喜欢甩鍋，从不愿意承认自己的错误。	He always likes to shirk responsibility and never admits his mistakes.	别再甩鍋了，这次错就在你身上。	Stop shirking responsibility, the fault is on you this time.	公司出了问题，他却一直在甩鍋。	The company had a problem, but he kept shirking responsibility.
死忠粉	& 鐵粉 [tiě fěn] n. Dead+loyal+fan. Iron+fan.	她是这位明星的死忠粉。	She is a hardcore fan of this celebrity.	这个歌手有很多鐵粉。	This singer has many hardcore fans.	他们是这支乐队的死忠粉。	They are hardcore fans of this band.

私人	private; personal; interpersonal; sb with whom one has a close personal relationship; a member of one's clique	这是我的私人物品，请不要触碰。	This is my personal item, please do not touch it.	私人关系不应该影响工作。	Personal relationships should not affect work.	他是我的私人助理。	He is my personal assistant.

隔壁老王	Mr Wang from next door (term used jocularly to refer to a neighbor who is supposedly sleeping with one's wife)	隔壁老王又在家里大声喧哗了。	Mr. Wang from next door is making a lot of noise at home again.	他总是把隔壁老王说得那么不堪。	He always talks about Mr. Wang from next door in such a derogatory way.	别再跟我提隔壁老王的事了。	Stop mentioning Mr. Wang from next door to me.
一向	a period of time in the recent past; (indicating a period of time up to the present) all along; the whole time	他一向都很害羞。	He has always been very shy.	她一向对我很好。	She has always been very kind to me.	这家餐厅的服务一向很好。	The service at this restaurant has always been very good.
行程	journey; travel route; distance of travel; course (of history); stroke (of a piston); (Tw) (computing) process	我们的行程包括参观博物馆和登山。	Our itinerary includes visiting museums and hiking.	这条行程需要花费大约两个小时。	This route takes about two hours.	这次旅行的行程很充实。	The itinerary of this trip is very fulfilling.

儒家	Confucian school, founded by Confucius 孔子[Kong3 zi3] (551-479 BC) and Mencius 孟子[Meng4 zi3] (c. 372-c. 289 BC)	儒家思想对中国文化产生了深远的影响。	Confucianism has had a profound influence on Chinese culture.	儒家强调家庭的重要性。	Confucianism emphasizes the importance of family.	儒家注重礼仪和道德。	Confucianism emphasizes etiquette and morality.
神仙	Daoist immortal; supernatural entity; (in modern fiction) fairy, elf, leprechaun etc; fig. lighthearted person	她总是被人说像个神仙。	People always say she looks like a fairy.	在这个故事里，神仙救了一个小孩。	In this story, a fairy saved a child.	他的美貌就像传说中的神仙一样。	His beauty is like that of a legendary fairy.
吞吞吐吐	to hum and haw (idiom); to mumble as if hiding sth; to speak and break off, then start again; to hold sth back	他吞吞吐吐地说了一大堆废话。	He mumbled a lot of nonsense.	她吞吞吐吐地解释了自己的行为。	She mumbled and explained her behavior.	别再吞吞吐吐了，直接告诉我真相。	Stop mumbling and just tell me the truth directly.
酝酿	(of alcohol) to ferment; (of a crisis) to be brewing; to mull over (an issue); to hold exploratory discussions	这场风暴已经酝酿了很久。	This storm has been brewing for a long time.	他们正在酝酿一场重大的改革。	They are brewing a major reform.	这个计划已经在酝酿中了。	The plan is already in the works.
方便	convenient; suitable; to facilitate; to make things easy; having money to spare; (euphemism) to relieve oneself	这个地方交通很方便。	This place has convenient transportation.	请问洗手间在哪里？我需要方便一下。	Excuse me, where is the restroom? I need to use it.	这个软件可以方便地管理你的日程安排。	This software can conveniently manage your schedule.
也	(adverb) also; both ... and ... (before predicates only); (literary) particle having functions similar to 啊[a5]	我也喜欢吃巧克力。	I also like to eat chocolate.	他们也会参加我们的聚会。	They will also join our gathering.	这个问题也许不那么简单。	This issue may not be that simple.

沒眼看	<Expression> [Having] no eyes to see. Can’t stand looking at [something embarrassing, shocking, or disgusting].	他做的事情真是让人沒眼看。	His actions are really embarrassing to watch.	这部电影太恶心了，我真是沒眼看。	This movie is so disgusting, I can't stand watching it.	她的行为让人沒眼看。	Her behavior is embarrassing to watch.
鵝廠	n. Goose+factory. Penguin factory. Tencent. This Internet slang term refers to Tencent whose logo is a penguin.	鵝廠的股票今天大涨。	Tencent's stock soared today.	很多人都在鵝廠工作。	Many people work at Tencent.	鵝廠的游戏很受欢迎。	Tencent's games are very popular.
救救孩子	<Expression> Save the child. This expression is often used when asking for help. “The child” refers to oneself.	救救孩子，我不知道该怎么办了。	Save me, I don't know what to do.	他受伤了，快救救孩子！	He's injured, quick, save him!	救救孩子，我迷路了。	Save me, I'm lost.

開封菜	n. The Kaifeng cuisine. This Internet slang term is a humorous moniker for KFC, because they share the acronym.	今天晚上吃開封菜怎么样？	How about having Kaifeng cuisine tonight?	他很喜欢開封菜。	He really likes Kaifeng cuisine.	開封菜的味道很好。	The taste of Kaifeng cuisine is very good.

大写加粗	adj. Written in bold and all caps. This Internet slang term is used to emphasize the words that come thereafter.	他的评论都是大写加粗的。	His comments are all written in bold and all caps.	在标题中使用大写加粗可以吸引更多的注意。	Using bold and all caps in the title can attract more attention.	这个词用大写加粗写出来更有力量。	Writing this word in bold and all caps makes it more powerful.

To eloquently roast a person to the point where the person shitted his or her pants.	他的讽刺让对方黑出翔。	His sarcasm roasted the other person to the point of embarrassment.	她的回应让他黑出翔。	Her response eloquently roasted him.	这个节目的主持人总是黑出翔。	The host of this show always eloquently roasts people.

通	classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)	他们进行了一通激烈的辩论。	They had a heated debate.	他弹了一通优美的曲子。	He played a beautiful piece of music.	他喝了一通酒。	He drank a lot of alcohol.

To persuade someone to become a fan of novels or manga delivered in serial form.	她成功地推坑了我，让我成为了小说的粉丝。	She successfully persuaded me to become a fan of the novel.	他一直在尝试推坑我，但我不感兴趣。	He has been trying to persuade me to become a fan, but I'm not interested.	这个作家很擅长推坑读者。	This author is very good at persuading readers to become fans.

買買買	v. Buy buy buy! This Internet slang term is often used humorously to convey or provoke a strong desire to splurge	今天看到了很多打折的东西，真想買買買！	Today I saw a lot of discounted items, really want to buy buy buy!	她看到了心仪已久的包包，忍不住買買買了起来。	She couldn't resist buying the bag she had been eyeing for a long time.	朋友们一起逛街，都变成了買買買的小怪兽。	When friends go shopping together, they all turn into little monsters who want to buy buy buy.

親測有效	<Expression> [I’ve] tested it myself; [it’s] effective. This expression is often used when recommending something.	这个方法我亲测有效。	I've personally tested this method and it's effective.	这款产品我亲测有效，你也可以试试。	I've personally tested this product and it's effective, you can give it a try too.	我亲测有效，你可以相信我。	I've tested it myself, you can trust me.
收	to receive; to accept; to collect; to put away; to restrain; to stop; in care of (used on address line after name)	我今天收到了你的包裹。	I received your package today.	他不愿意收我的礼物。	He doesn't want to accept my gift.	她把书收进了书包里。	She put the book away in her backpack.
解放	to liberate; to emancipate; liberation; refers to the Communists' victory over the Nationalists in 1949; CL:次[ci4]	这个城市在二战后解放了。	This city was liberated after World War II.	解放思想是非常重要的。	Liberating the mind is very important.	我们需要解放劳动力。	We need to liberate the workforce.
太极拳	shadowboxing or Taiji, T'aichi or T'aichichuan; traditional form of physical exercise or relaxation; a martial art	我每天早上都练太极拳。	I practice Tai Chi every morning.	太极拳对身体很有好处。	Tai Chi is very beneficial for the body.	他是一位太极拳的高手。	He is a master of Tai Chi.
尽	to use up; to exhaust; to end; to finish; to the utmost; exhausted; finished; to the limit (of sth); all; entirely	我尽了最大的努力。	I tried my best.	他尽了全力完成任务。	He did his utmost to complete the task.	这个问题我已经尽力了。	I've done all I can for this issue.
为难	to feel embarrassed or awkward; to make things difficult (for someone); to find things difficult (to do or manage)	他不想为难你。	He doesn't want to make things difficult for you.	她的问题让我为难。	Her question made me feel awkward.	这件事情真的让我为难。	This matter really makes it difficult for me.
块	lump; chunk; piece; classifier for pieces of cloth, cake, soap etc; (coll.) classifier for money and currency units	这块蛋糕很好吃。	This piece of cake is delicious.	我有一块钱。	I have one dollar.	这块布料很适合做衣服。	This piece of fabric is very suitable for making clothes.

C位	n. C position. The central position [in photo shooting or video taping, which implies the celebrity’s high status].	她一直在追求C位。	She has always been pursuing the central position.	这个明星一直稳坐C位。	This celebrity has always been firmly in the central position.	在这张合影中，她占据了C位。	In this group photo, she occupies the central position.
男頻	n. Male+channel. Internet novels that target male readers. Such novels are usually about wars and picking up women.	他喜欢看男频小说。	He likes to read internet novels targeting male readers.	这部小说是一部经典的男频作品。	This novel is a classic work targeting male readers.	男频小说的市场需求很大。	There is a high market demand for internet novels targeting male readers.
土肥圓	adj. Unsophisticated+fat+round. This derogatory Internet slang term is often used in body shaming and self-mockery.	她被人用土肥圆来调侃。	She was teased with the derogatory term "unsophisticated, fat, and round".	他总是自嘲自己是土肥圆。	He always self-mocks himself as unsophisticated, fat, and round.	这个词在网络上被用来进行身材歧视。	This term is used for body shaming on the internet.
量	capacity; quantity; amount; to estimate; abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar); measure word	这个杯子的量刚刚好。	The capacity of this cup is just right.	他量了一下米的数量。	He estimated the quantity of rice.	这个词是中文语法中的量词。	This word is a classifier in Chinese grammar.
神經病啊	<Expression> [One of Xue Zhiqian’s pet phrases] Neurotic! This expression means “Are you crazy?” or “Are you nuts?”	他又迟到了，真是神经病啊！	He's late again, he's really nuts!	你怎么能这么做？你是不是神经病啊？	How could you do this? Are you crazy?	他的行为真是让人觉得他是神经病啊！	His behavior really makes people think he's nuts!

霧草	n. Fog+glass. This Internet slang term is a euphemism for 我操 [wǒ cào] “I fuck” because of the similar pronunciation.	他听到了霧草，脸色一下子就变了。	He heard the euphemism and his face changed immediately.	别用霧草这样的词。	Don't use euphemisms like "fog glass".	她不小心说出了霧草。	She accidentally said the euphemism.
開畫	v. Open+picture. This Internet slang term is an alternative to 然而 [rán ér] and mimics the Cantonese accent.	他很忙，然鹅还是要来参加聚会。	He is very busy, but nevertheless, he still wants to come to the gathering.	我很累，然鹅还要继续工作。	I'm very tired, but nevertheless, I have to continue working.	这个计划很复杂，然鹅我们还是要尝试。	This plan is very complicated, but nevertheless, we still have to try.

任重道远	a heavy load and a long road; fig. to bear heavy responsibilities through a long struggle (cf Confucian Analects, 8.7)	作为领导，我们肩负着任重道远的责任。	As leaders, we shoulder the heavy responsibility of a long road ahead.	他知道自己的工作是任重道远的。	He knows that his work is a heavy responsibility and a long road.	在这条道路上，我们肩负着任重道远的使命。	On this road, we bear the heavy responsibility of a long journey.
宁可	preferably; one would prefer to...(or not to...); would rather; (would) be better to; (to pick) the lesser of two evils	我宁可自己做饭，也不想吃外卖。	I would rather cook for myself than eat takeout.	他宁可辞职，也不愿意继续忍受这种工作环境。	He would rather resign than continue to endure this work environment.	宁可少赚点钱，也不愿意牺牲健康。	I would rather earn less money than sacrifice my health.
囧司徒	n. Awkward+Situ [Chinese surname]. This Internet slang term is a nickname for Jon Stewart due to similar pronunciation.	他的囧司徒表情让大家捧腹大笑。	His awkward expression made everyone laugh out loud.	囧司徒在节目中总是能逗乐观众。	Jon Stewart always manages to amuse the audience on the show.	她的囧司徒风格让她成为了网络红人。	Her awkward Situ-style has made her an internet celebrity.

赏	to bestow (a reward); to give (to an inferior); to hand down; a reward (bestowed by a superior); to appreciate (beauty)	老板赏了他一份丰厚的奖金。	The boss rewarded him with a generous bonus.	他赏了她一件名贵的项链。	He gave her a precious necklace as a reward.	她赏赐了他一份珍贵的礼物。	She bestowed upon him a precious gift.

沙雕	adj./n. Sand+sculpture. This Internet slang term is a euphemism for 傻屌 [shǎ diǎo] “stupid+penis” or “stupid, stupid-ass.”	他们在沙滩上做了一个沙雕。	They made a sand sculpture on the beach.	这个词在网络用语中有特殊的含义。	This word has a special meaning in internet slang.	他的言行总是有点沙雕。	His words and actions are always a bit silly.
戾氣	n. Evil tendencies. This Internet slang term refers to the antisocial inclinations that people display online or offline.	他的言行充满了戾氣。	His words and actions are full of evil tendencies.	网络上的戾氣影响了很多人。	The evil tendencies online have influenced many people.	她的戾氣让人感到不安。	Her evil tendencies make people feel uneasy.

This Internet slang term is often used negatively to describe the confirmed scandal.	这是一个實錘，证明了他的罪行。	This is an irrefutable evidence that proves his wrongdoing.	他们找到了一些實錘，揭露了公司的丑闻。	They found some irrefutable evidence that exposed the company's scandal.	这个视频成为了實錘，让他无法再否认。	This video became an irrefutable evidence, making it impossible for him to deny it anymore.
馬路殺手	n. Road+killer. This Internet slang term refers to poor drivers. Female drivers are often unfairly labeled as road killers.	他开车像个馬路殺手，一点交通规则都不遵守。	He drives like a road killer, not following any traffic rules.	她被称为馬路殺手，只是因为她是女司机。	She is labeled as a road killer just because she is a female driver.	这个城市的馬路殺手太多了，交通安全需要得到重视。There are too many road killers in this city, and traffic safety needs to be taken seriously.

靈魂舞者	n. Soul+dancer. Soul dancer. This Internet slang term describes a person who botches a dance but exudes boundless confidence.	他虽然跳得不好，但却是个靈魂舞者。	Although he doesn't dance well, he is a soul dancer.	她是一个靈魂舞者，每次跳舞都充满自信。	She is a soul dancer, exuding confidence every time she dances.	这个节目上有一个靈魂舞者，虽然技术不好，但很有魅力。	There is a soul dancer on the show, not very skilled, but very charming.
而	and; as well as; and so; but (not); yet (not); (indicates causal relation); (indicates change of state); (indicates contrast)	他很努力，而且很聪明。	He works hard and is also very smart.	我喜欢唱歌，而她喜欢跳舞。	I like singing, while she likes dancing.	他昨天生病了，而今天却去上班了。	He was sick yesterday, but he went to work today.
新冠病毒	novel coronavirus (abbr. for 新型冠狀病毒|新型冠状病毒[xin1 xing2 guan1 zhuang4 bing4 du2]) (esp. SARS-CoV-2, the virus causing COVID-19)	新冠病毒给全世界带来了很大的影响。	The novel coronavirus has had a great impact on the world.	新冠病毒的疫苗已经研发成功。	The vaccine for the novel coronavirus has been successfully developed.	新冠病毒的传播速度很快。	The novel coronavirus spreads very quickly.
嬌嗔	v./n./adj. To protest coquettishly. This Internet slang term is often used humorously to describe the feminine side of a man.	他对女朋友嬌嗔地笑了笑。	He smiled coquettishly at his girlfriend.	他的嬌嗔让大家都笑了起来。	His coquettish protest made everyone laugh.	他有时候会嬌嗔一下，显得很可爱。	Sometimes he protests coquettishly, which looks very cute.
白古	n. White+Gu. The white Louis Koo. This Internet slang term is the nickname for Hong Kong actor Louis Koo in his untanned era.	他在白古时期演过很多经典电影。	He has acted in many classic movies during the white Louis Koo era.	白古时期的电影风格很独特。	The style of movies in the white Louis Koo era is very unique.	白古时期的电影给人留下了深刻的印象。	The movies from the white Louis Koo era left a deep impression on people.
培养	to cultivate; to breed; to foster; to nurture; to educate; to groom (for a position); education; fostering; culture (biology)	学校很重视学生的品德培养。	The school attaches great importance to the cultivation of students' character.	这个项目旨在培养年轻人的领导能力。	This project aims to cultivate the leadership skills of young people.	父母的爱是孩子健康成长的培养剂。	Parental love is the nutrient for a child's healthy growth.
登陆	to land; to come ashore; to make landfall (of typhoon etc); to log in (frequently used erroneous variant of 登錄|登录[deng1 lu4])	飞机将在几分钟后登陆。	The plane will land in a few minutes.	台风登陆后，带来了很大的破坏。	After the typhoon made landfall, it caused a lot of damage.	我无法登陆我的邮箱，可能是密码错误。	I can't log in to my email, probably because of the wrong password.
灣灣	n. Wan Wan. This Internet slang term was created by Mainland Internet users as a nickname for Taiwan or the Taiwanese people.	灣灣的风景很美。	The scenery of Taiwan is very beautiful.	他是个热爱灣灣文化的人。	He is a person who loves Taiwanese culture.	灣灣的美食吸引了很多游客。	Taiwan's cuisine attracts many tourists.
word	meanings	example sentence 1	translation 1	example sentence 2	translation 2	example sentence 3	translation 3
相应	to correspond; answering (one another); to agree (among the part); corresponding; relevant; appropriate; (modify) accordingly	你的行为和言语不相应。	Your actions and words do not correspond.	请相应地调整你的计划。	Please adjust your plan accordingly.	这个问题和我们的讨论不相应。	This issue is not relevant to our discussion.
抽	to draw out; to pull out from in between; to remove part of the whole; (of certain plants) to sprout or bud; to whip or thrash	他抽出了一张纸。	He pulled out a piece of paper.	她抽烟已经很多年了。	She has been smoking for many years.	这种植物每年都会抽新芽。	This plant sprouts new buds every year.
肉體飯	n. Body+fan. A fan who adores the idol’s body or figure, compared to other fans who adores the idol’s face, voice, hands, etc.	她是那个明星的肉體飯。	She is a fan of that celebrity's body.	肉體飯在粉丝群中占有一席之地。	Body fans have a place in the fan community.	她不是肉體飯，她是音乐的忠实粉丝。	She is not a body fan, she is a loyal fan of the music.
特别	unusual; special; very; especially; particularly; expressly; for a specific purpose; (often followed by 是[shi4]) in particular	今天的气温特别高。	Today's temperature is unusually high.	她对这个问题特别感兴趣。	She is particularly interested in this issue.	这个特别的日子我们应该好好庆祝。	We should celebrate this special day properly.
壯士	n. Hero, fighter. This Internet slang term is used humorously to address a fellow Internet user. Sarcasm is sometimes applied.	壯士，请留步，我有问题要问。	Hero, please stay, I have a question to ask.	壯士，你真是个幽默的人。	Fighter, you are really a humorous person.	他被称为网络上的壯士。	He is known as a hero on the internet.
究竟	to go to the bottom of a matter; after all; when all is said and done; (in an interrogative sentence) finally; outcome; result	这件事情究竟是怎么回事？	What is the bottom line of this matter?	究竟，他为什么要离开？	After all, why did he leave?	究竟结果是什么？	What is the final result?
连	to link; to join; to connect; continuously; in succession; including; (used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even; company (military)	他们连在一起形成了一个长队。	They linked together to form a long line.	这个节目连我都看过。	Even I have watched this show.	他们连家务都一起做。	They even do the housework together.
收圖	v. Collect+pictures. To save into one’s personal collection the pictures of one’s idol posted by other people on social media.	她喜欢收圖，把她喜欢的明星的照片都保存下来。	She likes to collect pictures and save the photos of her favorite celebrities.	他每天都会收圖，把他喜欢的明星的照片都收藏起来。	Every day, he collects pictures and saves the photos of his favorite celebrities.	我不太喜欢收圖，觉得没有必要。	I don't like collecting pictures, I don't think it's necessary.
挫折	setback; reverse; check; defeat; frustration; disappointment; to frustrate; to discourage; to set sb back; to blunt; to subdue	他经历了很多挫折，但从未放弃。	He has experienced a lot of setbacks, but never gave up.	这次失败对他来说是个挫折。	This failure is a setback for him.	挫折是成功路上的一部分。	Setbacks are part of the road to success.
佛系玩家	n. Buddhist+sect+gamer. The Buddhist gamer. This Internet slang term refers to gamers who don’t care about their game results.	他是个佛系玩家，只是为了放松而玩游戏。	He is a Buddhist gamer, just playing games to relax.	佛系玩家不会为游戏结果而烦恼。	Buddhist gamers don't worry about game results.	她不是佛系玩家，她很在意游戏的输赢。	She is not a Buddhist gamer, she cares a lot about winning or losing in games.

嘿嘿嘿	n. Hehehe. Lewd laughter. A euphemism for lovemaking used by Taiwanese entertainer Fei Yu-ching in one of his sex jokes on TV.	他对着屏幕嘿嘿嘿地笑了起来。	He laughed lewdly at the screen.	她听到他的笑声，知道他在嘿嘿嘿地讲黄段子。	She heard his laughter and knew he was telling dirty jokes.	他们在那里嘿嘿嘿地说笑着。	They were joking lewdly over there.
华侨	overseas Chinese; (in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality; CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]	这个华侨协会成立于二十世纪初。	This overseas Chinese association was established in the early 20th century.	他是一位华侨，但对祖国的感情非常深厚。	He is an overseas Chinese, but has a deep affection for his motherland.	华侨在海外也能保留自己的文化传统。	Overseas Chinese can also preserve their cultural traditions abroad.
似曾相识	déjà vu (the experience of seeing exactly the same situation a second time); seemingly familiar; apparently already acquainted	站在这里，我有一种似曾相识的感觉。	Standing here, I have a feeling of déjà vu.	这个地方让我感到似曾相识，但我却从未来过。	This place makes me feel familiar, but I have never been here before.	他的话让我觉得似曾相识，好像在哪里听过一样。	His words make me feel like I've heard them somewhere before.
班	team; class; grade; (military) squad; work shift; CL:個|个[ge4]; classifier for groups of people and scheduled transport vehicles	我们班有三十个学生。	There are thirty students in our class.	他们是同一个班的同学。	They are classmates in the same class.	这个班的学生都很优秀。	The students in this class are all excellent.
吃土	(neologism c. 2015) (slang) (used jokingly) to live on dirt (typically because one has spent all one's money on consumer items)	他这个月又吃土了，因为买了太多东西。	He's living on dirt again this month because he bought too many things.	她的生活方式让她经常吃土。	Her lifestyle often leads her to live on dirt.	他们因为买车买房，现在都在吃土。	They are all living on dirt now because of buying cars and houses.
烟	cigarette or pipe tobacco; CL:根[gen1]; smoke; mist; vapour; CL:縷|缕[lu:3]; tobacco plant; (of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke	他在吸烟吗？	Is he smoking?	烟从窗户里飘出来。	Smoke is coming out of the window.	她的眼睛因为烟而发红。	Her eyes turned red because of the smoke.
翼	wing; area surrounding the bullseye of a target; to assist; one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy; old variant of 翌	飞机的翼在飞行中扮演着重要的角色。	The wings of the airplane play an important role in flight.	他是我们团队的一只翼。	He is a wing of our team.	这个星座是中国古代二十八宿之一。	This constellation is one of the 28 constellations in ancient China.
株	tree trunk; stump (tree root); a plant; classifier for trees or plants; strain (biology); to involve others (in shady business)	这棵树的株很粗。	The trunk of this tree is very thick.	这是一株罕见的植物。	This is a rare plant.	他们试图株连九族。	They are trying to involve others in shady business.
白人饭	White People’s Food. hastily put together and pre-made meals commonly associated with white people, but also save time and money	这家餐厅主要提供白人饭。	This restaurant mainly provides White People’s Food.	他们喜欢吃白人饭，因为方便省事。	They like to eat White People’s Food because it's convenient and saves time.	白人饭通常是快餐，但也有一些精致的料理。	White People’s Food is usually fast food, but there are also some delicate dishes.
多	many; much; too many; in excess; (after a numeral) ... odd; how (to what extent) (Taiwan pr. [duo2]); (bound form) multi-; poly-	这里有很多人。	There are many people here.	他有很多书。	He has many books.	这个问题有很多答案。	This question has many answers.

湯老濕	n. Dirty Teacher Tang. This Internet slang term is a ludicrous nickname for English actor, producer, and former model Tom Hardy.	湯老濕在新電影中的表現非常出色。	Dirty Teacher Tang's performance in the new movie is excellent.	我很喜欢湯老濕的作品。	I really like the works of Dirty Teacher Tang.	湯老濕是一位多才多藝的藝人。	Dirty Teacher Tang is a versatile artist.
塞皇	n. Emperor Sai. This Internet slang term is a nickname for South African and American actress and film producer Charlize Theron.	塞皇在這部電影中的演技令人印象深刻。	Emperor Sai's acting in this movie is impressive.	她是一位备受喜爱的塞皇。	She is a beloved Emperor Sai.	塞皇的風格獨特而又迷人。	Emperor Sai's style is unique and charming.
多	many; much; too many; in excess; (after a numeral) ... odd; how (to what extent) (Taiwan pr. [duo2]); (bound form) multi-; poly-	他有多少兄弟姐妹？	How many siblings does he have?	这个城市有很多高楼大厦。	This city has many tall buildings.	多才多藝的藝人往往备受欢迎。	Versatile artists are often popular.
篇	sheet; piece of writing; bound set of bamboo slips used for record keeping (old); classifier for written items: chapter, article	这篇文章写得非常好。	This piece of writing is very well-written.	我读了一篇关于环保的报道。	I read an article about environmental protection.	这篇小说的情节非常吸引人。	The plot of this novel is very attractive.
女頻	n. Female+channel. Internet novels that target female readers. Such novels are usually about love triangles and homosexual love.	她喜欢写女頻小说。	She likes to write internet novels targeting female readers.	这本书是一部非常受欢迎的女頻小说。	This book is a very popular internet novel targeting female readers.	女頻小说的受众群体越来越广。	The audience of internet novels targeting female readers is becoming wider.
轮	wheel; disk; ring; steamship; to take turns; to rotate; classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn	我们轮流做家务。	We take turns doing the housework.	这是一辆新款的汽车轮胎。	This is a new type of car wheel.	这个游戏有多个轮次。	This game has multiple rounds.
喷	(of a smell) strong; peak season (of a crop); (classifier for the ordinal number of a crop, in the context of multiple harvests)	这个花园里的花香喷鼻。	The flowers in this garden have a strong fragrance.	这个季节是水果的喷季。	This season is the peak season for fruits.	这是第一喷的茶叶。	This is the first harvest of tea leaves.
气功	qigong, a traditional Chinese system of cultivating vital energy 氣|气[qi4] through coordinated breathing, movement and meditation	她每天早上都练习气功。	She practices qigong every morning.	气功对身体有很多好处。	Qigong has many benefits for the body.	气功是一种古老的健身方式。	Qigong is an ancient way of keeping fit.
吸血鬼	leech; bloodsucking vermin; vampire (translated European notion); fig. cruel exploiter, esp. a capitalist exploiting the workers	她喜欢看吸血鬼小说。	She likes to read vampire novels.	这部电影的主题是吸血鬼。	The theme of this movie is vampires.	他总是工作到很晚，就像个吸血鬼一样。	He always works late, just like a vampire.

油腻	greasy food; oily food; (of food) greasy; oily; fatty; (neologism c. 2017) (of a middle-aged man) obnoxious; pretentious; vulgar	这家餐厅的食物很油腻。	The food in this restaurant is very greasy.	她不喜欢吃油腻的食物。	She doesn't like to eat greasy food.	他不喜欢吃油腻的食物。	He doesn't like to eat greasy food.
大厦	(used in the names of grand buildings such as 百老匯大廈|百老汇大厦 Broadway Mansions (in Shanghai) or 帝國大廈|帝国大厦 Empire State Building etc)	这座大厦是这座城市的地标建筑。	This building is the landmark of the city.	帝国大厦是纽约的著名建筑之一。	The Empire State Building is one of the famous buildings in New York.	百老汇大厦是上海的著名建筑之一。	Broadway Mansions is one of the famous buildings in Shanghai.
夺	to seize; to take away forcibly; to wrest control of; to compete or strive for; to force one's way through; to leave out; to lose	他企图夺取对手的王位。	He attempted to seize the opponent's throne.	她夺走了我的心。	She took my heart away.	他夺冠了比赛。	He won the championship in the competition.
戒	to guard against; to exhort; to admonish or warn; to give up or stop doing sth; Buddhist monastic discipline; ring (for a finger)	他戒烟已经两年了。	He has quit smoking for two years.	她正在戒掉咖啡因。	She is trying to give up caffeine.	戒指是她的婚戒。	The ring is her wedding ring.
副	secondary; auxiliary; deputy; assistant; vice-; abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb; classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions	他是公司的副总裁。	He is the vice president of the company.	这是一副耳环。	This is a pair of earrings.	她是我的副手。	She is my assistant.
伐木累	n. Wood+cutting+exhausting. Exhausting to cut wood. This Internet slang term means “family” because of the similar pronunciation.	他们一家人都很伐木累。	The whole family is very close.	我们一起伐木累吧。	Let's be a family together.	伐木累是最重要的。	Family is the most important.
墻外	adj. On the other side of the wall. This Internet slang term refers to the Internet environment unaffected by the Great Firewall.	他们在墙外进行了自由的讨论。	They had a free discussion outside the wall.	我们需要打破墙外的限制。	We need to break the restrictions outside the wall.	墙外的世界很精彩。	The world outside the wall is wonderful.
釦釦熊	n. Button+button+bear. This Internet slang term is a nickname for Stephen Colbert because it sounds like his last name “Colbert.”	釦釦熊是一个著名的综艺节目主持人。	Colbert is a famous TV show host.	我很喜欢釦釦熊的幽默。	I really like Colbert's humor.	釦釦熊的节目很受欢迎。	Colbert's show is very popular.
逢	to meet by chance; to come across; (of a calendar event) to come along; (of an event) to fall on (a particular day); to fawn upon	我们在街上逢到了老朋友。	We met an old friend on the street.	逢年过节，我们都会聚在一起。	During festivals, we always gather together.	这个活动逢星期五举行。	This event is held on Fridays.
副	secondary; auxiliary; deputy; assistant; vice-; abbr. for 副詞|副词 adverb; classifier for pairs, sets of things & facial expressions	他是公司的副总裁。	He is the vice president of the company.	这是一副耳环。	This is a pair of earrings.	她是我的副手。	She is my assistant.

細思恐極	To think carefully about something to a point where one is petrified to the extreme.	她听了那个鬼故事后，細思恐極，不敢一个人在黑暗中走路。	After listening to that ghost story, she thought about it carefully and was petrified to the extreme, not daring to walk alone in the dark.	他細思恐極地考虑了自己的未来。	He thought carefully about his future to the point of extreme fear.	細思恐極是一种消极的心态。	Overthinking to the point of extreme fear is a negative mindset.
跳水	to dive (into water); (sports) diving; to commit suicide by jumping into water; (fig.) (of stock prices etc) to fall dramatically	她喜欢跳水，每个周末都会去游泳池。	She likes diving and goes to the swimming pool every weekend.	股市跳水了，很多投资者都受到了影响。	The stock market took a dive, and many investors were affected.	他选择跳水来结束自己的生命。	He chose to end his life by jumping into the water.
孕育	to be pregnant; to produce offspring; to nurture (a development, school of thought, artwork etc); fig. replete with (culture etc)	这个村庄孕育了很多优秀的艺术家。	This village has nurtured many outstanding artists.	她正在孕育着一个新的创意项目。	She is nurturing a new creative project.	这片土地孕育了丰富的文化。	This land is replete with rich culture.
一下	(used after a verb) give it a go; to do (sth for a bit to give it a try); one time; once; in a while; all of a sudden; all at once	我要试一下这个新的菜谱。	I want to give this new recipe a try.	他突然笑了一下，然后又沉默了。	He suddenly smiled for a moment, then fell silent again.	她只是想看一下你是否还在家。	She just wanted to see if you were still at home.
古風	n. Ancient style. This Internet slang term refers to literature, music, and art that portray or reflect the ancient Chinese style.	这幅画充满了古風。	This painting is full of ancient style.	她的作品总是带有一丝古風。	Her works always have a touch of ancient style.	这首歌曲充满了浓厚的古風。	This song is full of strong ancient style.
天菜	n. Heavenly dish. When you say someone is your “heavenly dish,” you mean that person is exactly your type—a person of your dreams.	她对我来说就是天菜。	She is my heavenly dish.	他一直认为她是他的天菜。	He has always thought of her as his heavenly dish.	她是他心目中的天菜。	She is the heavenly dish in his mind.
熟	ripe; mature; thoroughly cooked; done; familiar; acquainted; experienced; skilled; (of sleep etc) deep; profound; also pr. [shou2]	这个水果还没有熟。	This fruit is not ripe yet.	他对这个地方非常熟。	He is very familiar with this place.	她是一名熟练的厨师。	She is a skilled chef.
盆栽精	n. Bonsai+elf/spirit. This Internet slang term is a loving nickname for The Weeknd due to his dreadlocks resembling a bonsai tree.	盆栽精的音乐总是让人陶醉。	The Weeknd's music always intoxicates people.	他被粉丝们称为盆栽精。	He is called "Bonsai Spirit" by his fans.	盆栽精的音乐风格独特。	The Weeknd's music style is unique.
整体	whole entity; entire body; synthesis; as a whole (situation, construction, team etc); global; macrocosm; integral; holistic; whole	我们需要考虑整体的情况。	We need to consider the whole situation.	整体规划了城市的未来发展。	The future development of the city is planned as a whole.	整体来看，这个团队非常出色。	Overall, this team is very outstanding.
口耐	adj. Mouth+resistant. Lovely. Cute. This Internet slang term is 可爱 [kě ài] “lovely, cute” and mimics the Taiwanese Mandarin accent.	她的宠物真是口耐。	Her pet is really lovely.	这件衣服看起来很口耐。	This piece of clothing looks very cute.	这只小猫非常口耐。	This little cat is very adorable.

拿	to hold; to seize; to catch; to apprehend; to take; (used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)	他拿着一本书。	He is holding a book.	我可以拿这个吗？	Can I take this?	警察拿住了小偷。	The police caught the thief.
神	god; deity; supernatural; magical; mysterious; spirit; mind; energy; lively; expressive; look; expression; (coll.) awesome; amazing	她相信神存在。	She believes in the existence of gods.	他的表演太神了！	His performance is amazing!	她的眼神很神秘。	Her eyes look very mysterious.
走心	to take care; to be mindful; (Internet slang) to be moved by sth; poignant; to have deep feelings for sb; to lose one's heart to sb	这个故事真的很走心。	This story is really touching.	她的歌声总是能走到人心。	Her singing always touches people's hearts.	他对待每个人都很走心。	He treats everyone with deep care.
治	to rule; to govern; to manage; to control; to harness (a river); to treat (a disease); to wipe out (a pest); to punish; to research	这个国家的领导人很有能力治理国家。	The country's leaders are very capable of governing the country.	医生正在治疗他的病。	The doctor is treating his illness.	我们需要治理环境污染问题。	We need to control the environmental pollution problem.
富二代	children of entrepreneurs who became wealthy under Deng Xiaoping's economic reforms in the 1980s; see also 窮二代|穷二代[qiong2 er4 dai4]	他是一个典型的富二代。	He is a typical second-generation rich.	富二代在社交媒体上展示奢华生活。	The second-generation rich display their luxurious lifestyle on social media.	富二代的成长环境与普通人不同。	The growth environment of the second-generation rich is different from ordinary people.
人設已崩	Character design+already+collapse. [Often of a celebrity] image is ruined, usually because of his or her own inappropriate behavior.	他的人设已崩，粉丝们很失望。	His image is ruined, and the fans are very disappointed.	这位明星的人设已崩，舆论很不利。	This star's image is ruined, and public opinion is very unfavorable.	她的人设已崩，事业受到了影响。	Her image is ruined, and her career has been affected.
撑	to support; to prop up; to push or move with a pole; to maintain; to open or unfurl; to fill to bursting point; brace; stay; support	他用手撑着下巴。	He is propping up his chin with his hand.	这个伞已经撑不住了。	This umbrella can't hold up anymore.	他的信心撑起了他的事业。	His confidence supports his career.
搬運	v. To transport. This Internet slang term means to download videos, articles, photos, etc. and then repost  them on another website.	他经常在社交平台上搬运有趣的视频。	He often reposts interesting videos on social media platforms.	这篇文章被搬运到了其他网站。	This article has been reposted to other websites.	她搬运了一些有趣的图片到她的博客上。	She transported some interesting pictures to her blog.
顏狗	n. Face+dog. A person who is easily attracted to good-looking people or stars, sometimes to the extent of ignoring their weaknesses.	他是一个典型的顏狗，只看重外表。	He is a typical "face dog," only valuing appearances.	她不是一个顏狗，她更注重内在。	She is not a "face dog," she pays more attention to the inner qualities.	很多顏狗只看重明星的颜值。	Many "face dogs" only value the appearance of celebrities.
神同步	n. Magic simultaneity. This Internet slang term is often used to describe the situation where people display the same body language.	他们的动作神同步，好像是一体的。	Their movements are magically synchronized, as if they were one.	这支舞蹈队的神同步表演赢得了观众的喝彩。	The dance team's magically synchronized performance won the applause of the audience.	他们的神同步动作让人印象深刻。	Their magically synchronized movements are impressive.
word	meanings	example sentence 1	translation 1	example sentence 2	translation 2	example sentence 3	translation 3
佛系	chill about everything (typically used to describe young people who don't buy into aspirational society)	他是个佛系青年，对很多事情都不太在乎。	He is a chill young person and doesn't care much about many things.	她的生活态度很佛系，不追求名利。	Her attitude towards life is very chill, not pursuing fame and fortune.	年轻人现在更倾向于佛系生活。	Young people nowadays tend to prefer a chill lifestyle.
旁友	n. Beside+friend. Friend. This Internet slang term is a phonetic deviation of 朋友 [péng yǒu] “friend” and 胖友 [pàng yǒu] “fat friend.”	我和我的旁友一起去看电影。	I'm going to the movies with my friend.	她是我的旁友，我们一起长大。	She is my friend, we grew up together.	他们是旁友，关系非常好。	They are friends, and their relationship is very good.
以上	that level or higher; that amount or more; the above-mentioned; (used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.	以上是我对这个问题的看法。	That's my opinion on this issue.	这些材料以上已经提交给老板了。	These materials have been submitted to the boss.	以上就是我要说的，谢谢大家。	That's all I want to say, thank you all.
松	loose; to loosen; to relax; floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)	她的衣服太松了，需要换一件合身的。	Her clothes are too loose, she needs to change into a better-fitting one.	他松了一口气，终于完成了任务。	He relaxed and finally completed the task.	这道菜的松软口感很受欢迎。	The loose and soft texture of this dish is very popular.
腦殘	adj. Brain+disabled. Literally “brain-damaged”, this slang term is often used to laugh at a person who is ludicrous, dumb, or weird.	他的行为真是脑残，让人无语。	His behavior is really brain-damaged, leaving people speechless.	她总是说一些脑残的笑话，让大家捧腹大笑。	She always tells some brain-damaged jokes that make everyone laugh out loud.	别再做脑残的事情了，好吗？	Stop doing brain-damaged things, okay?
孝顺	filial; dutiful; devoted to one's parents (and grandparents etc); to show filial piety towards (an older family member); filial piety	他对父母非常孝顺，经常照顾他们。	He is very filial to his parents and often takes care of them.	在中国，孝顺是传统美德之一。	In China, filial piety is one of the traditional virtues.	她的孝顺深受家人的赞扬。	Her filial piety is highly praised by her family.
起到	(in an expression of the form 起到…作用[qi3 dao4 xx5 zuo4 yong4]) to have (a (motivating etc) effect); to play (a (stabilizing etc) role)	这个规定起到了很好的约束作用。	This regulation has played a very good restraining role.	他的话起到了很好的鼓舞作用。	His words have had a very good inspiring effect.	这个药起到了很好的治疗作用。	This medicine has had a very good therapeutic effect.
小黃書	n. Little+yellow+book. The yellow little book is a nickname for books and magazines characterized by either pornography or eroticism.	他偷偷地看了一本小黄书。	He secretly read a little yellow book.	小黄书在很多国家都是非法出版物。	Little yellow books are illegal publications in many countries.	她发现了他的小黄书收藏，非常生气。	She found his collection of little yellow books and was very angry.
通用	to use anywhere, anytime (card, ticket etc); to be used by everyone (language, textbook etc); (of two or more things) interchangeable	这种信用卡在全国范围内通用。	This credit card is universally accepted nationwide.	这本教材通用于不同的学校。	This textbook is used in different schools.	这两种规格的零件是通用的。	These two specifications of parts are interchangeable.
軟妹	n. Soft+sister. Young women who are very feminine. Borrowed from the Japanese ACG culture, this Internet slang term is a little sexist	她是个典型的软妹，喜欢粉色和公主裙。	She is a typical soft sister, she likes pink and princess dresses.	现在很多软妹都喜欢追星。	Many soft sisters like to chase after celebrities.	软妹文化在年轻女性中很受欢迎。	Soft sister culture is very popular among young women.
word	meanings	example sentence 1	translation 1	example sentence 2	translation 2	example sentence 3	translation 3
断	to break; to snap; to cut off; to give up or abstain from sth; to judge; (usu. used in the negative) absolutely; definitely; decidedly	他断了一根树枝。	He broke a branch.	她断绝了和他的联系。	She cut off contact with him.	我断定这个计划会成功。	I am sure this plan will succeed.
菇涼	n. Mushroom+cold. Girl. This Internet slang term is 姑娘 [gū niáng] “girl” in the Lanzhou dialect. It is often used for humorous effect.	她是一个可爱的菇凉。	She is a lovely girl.	这个菇凉真有趣。	This girl is really interesting.	他喜欢和菇凉们一起玩。	He likes to play with the girls.
跑	to run; to run away; to escape; to run around (on errands etc); (of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate; (verb complement) away; off	我喜欢在早晨跑步。	I like to run in the morning.	他跑了很远。	He ran very far.	汽油跑了。	The gasoline leaked.
较	(bound form) to compare; (literary) to dispute; compared to; (before an adjective) relatively; comparatively; rather; also pr. [jiao3]	这个城市的天气较冷。	The weather in this city is relatively cold.	他的成绩较好。	His grades are relatively good.	这个问题较难。	This question is relatively difficult.
化解	to dissolve; to resolve (contradictions); to dispel (doubts); to iron out (difficulties); to defuse (conflicts); to neutralize (fears)	我们需要化解这个矛盾。	We need to resolve this contradiction.	他们成功地化解了这场冲突。	They successfully defused this conflict.	这个方案能够化解我们的困境。	This plan can resolve our dilemma.
送分題	n. Send+point+problem. Very easy question [on an exam]. This Internet slang term refers to question to which you must know the answer.	这是一个送分题，你一定能答对。	This is a very easy question, you can definitely answer it correctly.	老师出了一个送分题。	The teacher gave a very easy question.	这个送分题太简单了。	This easy question is too simple.
颠簸	to be jolted around (car on a bumpy road, boat on a rough sea, aircraft experiencing turbulence); (fig.) to undergo a rough experience	汽车在颠簸的路上行驶。	The car travels on a bumpy road.	飞机经历了颠簸。	The plane experienced turbulence.	他的生活经历了很多颠簸。	His life has undergone a lot of rough experiences.
开花	to bloom; to blossom; to flower; (fig.) to burst; to split open; (fig.) to burst with joy; (fig.) to spring up everywhere; to flourish	春天树木开花了。	The trees bloom in spring.	她的笑容让整个房间开花了。	Her smile made the whole room light up.	这个城市经济正在开花。	The economy of this city is flourishing.
期	a period of time; phase; stage; classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study; time; term; period; to hope; Taiwan pr. [qi2]	这是一个重要的发展期。	This is an important development period.	我期待着下个学期。	I am looking forward to the next semester.	他们正在经历困难的时期。	They are going through a difficult period.
偏	to lean; to slant; oblique; prejudiced; to deviate from average; to stray from the intended line; stubbornly; contrary to expectations	他的观点有点偏。	His viewpoint is a bit biased.	她的性格有些偏。	Her personality is a bit quirky.	他偏离了原来的路线。	He deviated from the original route.

粉丝	bean vermicelli; mung bean starch noodles; Chinese vermicelli; cellophane noodles; CL:把[ba3]; fan (loanword); enthusiast for sb or sth	我喜欢吃粉丝凉菜。	I like to eat cold dishes made with bean vermicelli.	她是这位明星的粉丝。	She is a fan of this celebrity.	这家餐馆的粉丝汤非常好喝。	The bean vermicelli soup in this restaurant is very delicious.
见义勇为	to see what is right and act courageously (idiom, from Analects); to stand up bravely for the truth; acting heroically in a just cause	他的见义勇为受到了大家的赞扬。	His act of standing up bravely for the truth was praised by everyone.	在危急关头，他展现了见义勇为的精神。	At a critical moment, he showed the spirit of acting heroically in a just cause.	我们应该学习见义勇为的品质。	We should learn the quality of standing up bravely for the truth.
养活	to provide for; to keep (animals, a family etc); to raise animals; to feed and clothe; support; the necessities of life; to give birth	这个家庭靠种地养活自己。	This family supports themselves by farming.	他们养活了一大群动物。	They raise a large number of animals.	她一个人养活了三个孩子。	She supports three children on her own.
菜	vegetable; greens (CL:棵[ke1]); dish (of food) (CL:樣|样[yang4],道[dao4],盤|盘[pan2]); (of one's skills etc) weak; poor; (coll.) (one's) type	这家餐厅的菜很好吃。	The dishes in this restaurant are delicious.	他的厨艺很好，做的菜样样精通。	His cooking skills are very good, and he is proficient in all kinds of dishes.	她的菜做得很好吃。	Her dishes are very delicious.
产生	to arise; to come into being; to come about; to give rise to; to bring into being; to bring about; to produce; to engender; to generate	这个问题产生了很多争议。	This issue has generated a lot of controversy.	这个新发明产生了巨大的影响。	This new invention has had a huge impact.	这种政策可能会产生一些负面影响。	This policy may bring about some negative effects.
药	medicine; drug; substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting); CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]; to poison	这种药对我的感冒很有效。	This medicine is very effective for my cold.	他是一名药剂师，专门研究药物。	He is a pharmacist who specializes in studying drugs.	这种药可以治疗头痛。	This medicine can treat headaches.
干	tree trunk; main part of sth; to manage; to work; to do; capable; cadre; to kill (slang); to fuck (vulgar); (coll.) pissed off; annoyed	这棵树的干很粗。	The trunk of this tree is very thick.	他在公司负责干一些重要的工作。	He is responsible for doing some important work in the company.	别干这种傻事了。	Stop doing such stupid things.
急诊	to give or receive urgent medical treatment; emergency treatment (at a hospital emergency department, or from a doctor on a house call)	他被送到急诊室接受治疗。	He was taken to the emergency room for treatment.	医生在急诊室里忙碌地工作着。	The doctor is busy working in the emergency room.	急诊室里的医生都非常敬业。	The doctors in the emergency room are very dedicated.
录取	to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam; to admit (a student); to hire (a job candidate)	他被这所大学录取了。	He was admitted to this university.	这家公司录取了很多应届毕业生。	This company has hired many fresh graduates.	她很幸运地被录取了。	She was lucky to be admitted.
打臉	v. To slap one’s own face. To behave in ways that contradict one’s previous statements; to have one’s claims contradicted by the truth.	他的言行经常打臉。	His words and actions often contradict each other.	别总是打臉，要说到做到。	Stop contradicting yourself all the time, and do what you say.	他的谎言最终被事实打臉了。	His lies were eventually contradicted by the truth.
word	meanings	example sentence 1	translation 1	example sentence 2	translation 2	example sentence 3	translation 3
甜寵	“sweet and pampering” idol dramas which are replete with sweet romantic scenes where the male lead would do anything for the female lead	我喜欢看甜寵剧。	I like to watch sweet and pampering dramas.	这部电视剧充满了甜寵元素。	This TV series is full of sweet and pampering elements.	她是甜寵剧的忠实粉丝。	She is a loyal fan of sweet and pampering dramas.
当	at or in the very same...; suitable; adequate; fitting; proper; to replace; to regard as; to think; to pawn; (coll.) to fail (a student)	当你需要帮助时，我会在你身边。	I will be by your side when you need help.	这个位置正当合适。	This position is just right.	他当了老师很多年。	He has been a teacher for many years.
附件	appendix (in a document); enclosure (accompanying a document); (email) attachment; accessory (for a car, computer etc); (anatomy) adnexa	请查看附件的文件。	Please check the document in the attachment.	这封邮件有两个附件。	This email has two attachments.	这个文件的附件很重要。	The appendix of this document is very important.
澄清	to settle (of liquid); to become clear (by precipitation of impurities); precipitate (chemistry); to put in order; to quell disturbances	他澄清了关于他的谣言。	He clarified the rumors about him.	这个问题需要澄清。	This issue needs to be clarified.	她的解释澄清了误会。	Her explanation cleared up the misunderstanding.
绿茶	green tea; (slang) (of a girl) seemingly innocent and charming but actually calculating and manipulative; a girl who has these qualities	我喜欢喝绿茶。	I like to drink green tea.	她是一个绿茶女孩。	She is a green tea girl.	他看起来很绿茶，但实际上很聪明。	He looks very green tea, but he is actually very smart.
抖森	n. Tremble+forest. This Internet slang term is a nickname for Tom Hiddleston because it sounds a little like his last name “Hiddleston.”	抖森在这部电影中表现得非常出色。	Tom Hiddleston performed very well in this movie.	抖森的粉丝很多。	Tom Hiddleston has many fans.	我很喜欢抖森的电影。	I really like Tom Hiddleston's movies.
判	(bound form) to differentiate; to distinguish; (bound form) clearly (different); to judge; to decide; to grade; (of a judge) to sentence	法官判了他五年监禁。	The judge sentenced him to five years in prison.	这个问题需要判清楚。	This issue needs to be judged clearly.	他被判有罪。	He was judged guilty.
与其	rather than... (used in expressions of the form 與其|与其[yu3qi2] + {verb1} + 不如[bu4ru2] + {verb2} "rather than {verb1}, better to {verb2}")	与其等待，不如行动。	Rather than waiting, it's better to take action.	与其抱怨，不如改变。	Rather than complaining, it's better to change.	与其后悔，不如努力。	Rather than regretting, it's better to work hard.
人道	human sympathy; humanitarianism; humane; the "human way", one of the stages in the cycle of reincarnation (Buddhism); sexual intercourse	他的行为充满了人道精神。	His behavior is full of human sympathy.	这个组织致力于人道事业。	This organization is dedicated to humanitarianism.	人道主义是我们应该追求的。	Humanitarianism is what we should pursue.
折腾	to toss from side to side (e.g. sleeplessly); to repeat sth over and over again; to torment sb; to play crazy; to squander (time, money)	他整晚都在床上折腾。	He tossed and turned in bed all night.	别再折腾了，好好休息吧。	Stop messing around and get some rest.	这件事情折腾了我很久。	This matter has been bothering me for a long time.

届	to arrive at (place or time); period; to become due; classifier for events, meetings, elections, sporting fixtures, years (of graduation)	毕业届的学生们都很兴奋。	The students of the graduating class are all very excited.	下届奥运会将在巴黎举行。	The next Olympic Games will be held in Paris.	这是我第一届参加的比赛。	This is the first competition I have participated in.
鬥圖	v. Compete+pictures. To bicker or joke using pictures. This Internet slang term refers to having a playful pictorial conversation online.	他们在微信上鬥圖，互相调侃。	They bicker and joke using pictures on WeChat, teasing each other.	我们经常在社交媒体上鬥圖，很有趣。	We often compete using pictures on social media, it's very fun.	鬥圖已经成为了我们之间的一种交流方式。	Competing with pictures has become a way of communication between us.
正	straight; upright; proper; main; principal; to correct; to rectify; exactly; just (at that time); right (in that place); (math.) positive	他站得很正。	He stands very straight.	这是正道。	This is the right path.	他正在正视自己的错误。	He is correcting his mistakes.
吸霾	v. Sniff+smog. To have to sniff smog constantly because of air pollution. This Internet slang term mimics the word 吸煙 [xī yān] “smoking.”	这座城市的居民每天都在吸霾。	The residents of this city sniff smog every day.	空气污染导致人们不得不吸霾。	Air pollution causes people to have to sniff smog.	吸霾对健康有害。	Sniffing smog is harmful to health.
泥萌	pron. Mud+cute. You guys. This Internet slang term is a phonetic deviation of 你們 [nǐ men] “you guys.” This term is often used humorously.	泥萌都在等你。	You guys are all waiting.	泥萌都很棒！	You guys are all great!	泥萌的笑容让我感到幸福。	Your smiles make me happy.
造	to make; to build; to manufacture; to invent; to fabricate; to go to; party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement); crop; classifier for crops	他们造了一座新桥。	They built a new bridge.	这个公司造汽车。	This company manufactures cars.	他们造了一个新的游戏。	They invented a new game.
無感	adj. No feeling. Show no interest. To be not affected. This Internet slang term is used to show your disinterest in someone or something.	他对这个话题完全無感。	He has no interest in this topic at all.	我對這件事無感。	I have no feeling about this matter.	他對這個人無感。	He has no feeling towards this person.
感冒	to catch cold; (common) cold; CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]; (coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative); (Tw) to detest; can't stand	他昨天感冒了。	He caught a cold yesterday.	她感冒了，所以今天不来上班。	She caught a cold, so she won't come to work today.	我很讨厌感冒。	I really detest catching a cold.
word	meanings	example sentence 1	translation 1	example sentence 2	translation 2	example sentence 3	translation 3
不服憋著	<Expression> If you are not convinced, hold it in. This expression is often used to show one’s confidence about one’s ability or argument.	他对自己的能力很有信心，不服憋著。	He is very confident in his abilities and doesn't hold back.	她总是不服憋著，充满自信。	She always shows confidence and doesn't hold back.	虽然有人怀疑他，但他不服憋著，继续前行。	Although some doubt him, he doesn't hold back and continues forward.
科恩嫂	n. Coen+sister-in-law. This Internet slang term is Chinese Internet users’ nickname for Frances McDormand because she is Joel Coen’s wife.	科恩嫂因为丈夫是著名导演，备受关注。	Frances McDormand, known as "Coen's sister-in-law," receives a lot of attention because of her famous director husband.	她因为出演了著名电影而被戏称为科恩嫂。	She is jokingly called "Coen's sister-in-law" because of her role in a famous movie.	科恩嫂在影坛有着自己的光芒。	"Coen's sister-in-law" shines in the film industry in her own right.
流量	flow rate; throughput of passengers; volume of traffic; (hydrology) discharge; data traffic; network traffic; website traffic; mobile data	这个网站的流量很大。	This website has a large volume of traffic.	我们需要提高网站的流量。	We need to increase the traffic to the website.	手机流量用完了，需要充值。	The mobile data is used up, and needs to be recharged.
怪我咯	<Expression> My bad? So you think it is my fault? The person who uses this Internet slang term usually doesn’t think he or she is to blame	怪我咯，我忘了提醒你。	My bad, I forgot to remind you.	怪我咯，我没听清楚。	My bad, I didn't hear clearly.	怪我咯，我搞错了。	My bad, I made a mistake.
秃	bald (lacking hair or feathers); barren; bare; denuded; blunt (lacking a point); (of a piece of writing) unsatisfactory; lacking something	他的头发越来越秃了。	His hair is getting more and more bald.	这片土地已经秃了很久。	This piece of land has been barren for a long time.	他的笔调很秃，缺乏灵感。	His writing is very unsatisfactory, lacking inspiration.
阿姨	maternal aunt; step-mother; childcare worker; nursemaid; woman of similar age to one's parents (term of address used by child); CL:個|个[ge4]	她是我的阿姨，也是我的保姆。	She is my aunt and also my nanny.	这个阿姨对孩子们很好。	This aunt is very good to the children.	阿姨，我想要一杯水。Auntie, I want a glass of water.
笔	pen; pencil; writing brush; to write or compose; the strokes of Chinese characters; classifier for sums of money, deals; CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]	这支笔写起字来很顺手。	This pen writes very smoothly.	他正在用毛笔写字。	He is writing with a writing brush.	这个合同签字需要用笔。	This contract needs to be signed with a pen.
机场	airport; airfield; (slang) service provider for Shadowsocks or similar software for circumventing Internet censorship; CL:家[jia1],處|处[chu4]	我要去机场接朋友。	I'm going to the airport to pick up a friend.	这个机场的服务很好。	The service at this airport is very good.	机场的安检很严格。	The airport security check is very strict.
动	(of sth) to move; to set in movement; to displace; to touch; to make use of; to stir (emotions); to alter; abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb	他的眼睛动了一下。	His eyes moved for a moment.	这个机器需要动一下才能工作。	This machine needs to be moved a bit to work.	他的话动了我的心。	His words stirred my heart.
能打	adj. Can+fight. Competitive. This Internet slang term is often used to describe an entertainer’s appearance, acting, singing, fashion, etc.	她的表演很有特点，很能打。	Her performance is very distinctive and competitive.	这个歌手很有实力，很能打。	This singer has a lot of strength and is very competitive.	他的穿搭总是很有品味，很能打。	His outfits are always very tasteful and competitive.

奔現	Run+reality	他们在网上认识，然后奔现见面了。	They met online, and then met in person.	她们决定奔现，看看彼此是否合适。	They decided to meet in person to see if they were suitable for each other.	他们奔现后，发现彼此很合得来。	After meeting in person, they found they got along well.
排	a row; a line	他们排成一排等待进入游乐园。	They lined up and waited to enter the amusement park.	她排好了行李，准备出发。	She arranged her luggage and prepared to leave.	他们排除了所有障碍，顺利完成了比赛。	They eliminated all obstacles and successfully completed the competition.
佛系青年	Buddhist+sect+youth	他是一个佛系青年，对名利不太在意。	He is a Buddhist youth, not very concerned about fame and fortune.	她的佛系生活态度让人羡慕。	Her Buddhist lifestyle is enviable.	这个年轻人被称为佛系青年，因为他对物质生活不感兴趣。	This young man is called a Buddhist youth because he is not interested in material life.
茄子	eggplant	今晚的晚餐有炒茄子。	There is stir-fried eggplant for dinner tonight.	她不喜欢吃茄子。	She doesn't like to eat eggplant.	这个菜谱里有很多茄子的做法。	There are many recipes for eggplant in this cookbook.
土	earth; local	他们在土里挖出了一些古代器物。	They dug out some ancient artifacts from the earth.	这个地方的土特别肥沃。	The soil in this place is particularly fertile.	他们用土建造了一个小房子。	They built a small house with earth.
总监	head; director	他是这个部门的总监。	He is the director of this department.	她成为了公司的总监。	She became the head of the company.	总监的职责包括管理和监督。	The responsibilities of the director include management and supervision.
慰安妇	comfort woman	慰安妇受到了极大的伤害。	Comfort women suffered great harm.	她的祖母是一位慰安妇。	Her grandmother was a comfort woman.	慰安妇问题一直备受争议。	The issue of comfort women has always been controversial.
窝	nest; lair	小鸟在树上筑了一个窝。	The bird built a nest in the tree.	他们在山洞里找到了熊的窝。	They found the bear's lair in the cave.	这只狐狸在这个地方筑了一个窝。	The fox built a nest in this place.
多么	how (wonderful etc)	今天的天气多么好啊！	How wonderful the weather is today!	她多么聪明啊！	How smart she is!	这个问题多么困难啊！	How difficult this problem is!

low	adj. Showing poor quality or taste or moral standards. Usually written with the lowercase “l”, this word means tacky, tasteless, or immoral.	这件衣服的质量很低。	The quality of this clothing is very low.	他的行为真的很低。	His behavior is really low.	这个笑话有点低俗。	This joke is a bit lowbrow.
单位	unit (of measure); unit (group of people as a whole); work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform); CL:個|个[ge4]	这个单位的工作很忙。	The work in this unit is very busy.	他们是一个单位的同事。	They are colleagues in the same unit.	他在这个单位工作了十年。	He has worked in this unit for ten years.
尽管	despite; although; even though; in spite of; unhesitatingly; do not hesitate (to ask, complain etc); (go ahead and do it) without hesitating	尽管下雨，他还是去了。	Although it was raining, he still went.	尽管困难重重，他们仍然坚持下去。	Despite the numerous difficulties, they still persisted.	你尽管问，我一定会告诉你的。	You can ask without hesitation, I will definitely tell you.
转	to revolve; to turn; to circle about; to walk about; classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm; classifier for repeated actions	地球每天都会自转。	The earth revolves every day.	他转身离开了。	He turned around and left.	她转了一圈，找到了她的朋友。	She walked around and found her friend.
画风	n. Painting style. This Internet slang term is often used to describe one’s style in appearance and behavior or the vibes in an environment.	这幅画的画风很独特。	The painting style of this painting is very unique.	他的画风很清新。	His painting style is very fresh.	这个地方的画风很有特色。	The vibes in this place are very distinctive.
四字弟弟	n. Four-character little brother. This Internet slang term is an affectionate nickname for Chinese entertainer Yiyang Qianxi aka Jackson Yee.	四字弟弟的新歌很受欢迎。	The new song of Four-character Little Brother is very popular.	四字弟弟的表演很精彩。	Four-character Little Brother's performance is wonderful.	四字弟弟的粉丝很多。	Four-character Little Brother has many fans.
偉光正	adj. Great, honorable, and correct. This Internet slang term is short for 偉大，光榮，正確 [wěi dà, guāng róng, zhèng què], often used sarcastically.	他的行为真是偉光正啊。	His behavior is really great, honorable, and correct.	这个解释偉光正极了。	This explanation is great, honorable, and correct.	她的态度偉光正。	Her attitude is great, honorable, and correct.
卷福	n. Curly+Holmes. This Internet slang term is a nickname for Benedict Cumberbatch because of his curly hair and his character Sherlock Holmes.	卷福的演技很出色。	Curly+Holmes' acting skills are excellent.	卷福在这部电影中表现很好。	Curly+Holmes performed very well in this movie.	卷福的扮演让人印象深刻。	Curly+Holmes' portrayal is impressive.
喪心病狂	adj. Frenzied and perverse. As an Internet slang term, it is often used positively or neutrally to describe one’s wildly unexpected behavior.	他的创意真是喪心病狂。	His creativity is truly frenzied and perverse.	这个计划太喪心病狂了。	This plan is too frenzied and perverse.	她的表演喪心病狂，让人印象深刻。	Her performance is frenzied and perverse, leaving a deep impression.
干燥	(of weather, climate, soil etc) dry; arid; (of skin, mouth etc) dry; (fig.) dull; dry; boring; (of timber etc) to dry out; to season; to cure	这个地方的气候很干燥。	The climate in this place is very dry.	她的皮肤很干燥。	Her skin is very dry.	这本书写得很干燥。	This book is written very dryly.

Professor Du, referring to Do Min-joon from the South Korean TV show My Love from the Star which was tremendously popular in China in 2013	《来自星星的你》中的都教授是一个非常有魅力的角色。	Professor Du in "My Love from the Star" is a very charming character.	她是都教授的忠实粉丝。	She is a loyal fan of Professor Du.	都教授的形象深入人心。	Professor Du's image is deeply ingrained in people's hearts.
